description: This file implements object management functions for an Advanced Networking Service Container (ANSC). It includes functions to register objects and create objects based on name, OID, or type, as well as mapping objects by runtime ID. The functions make extensive use of an internal object mapper and handle object registration and creation logic.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscOcoRegisterObject1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * objectName,ULONG oid,void * pfnCreate,void * pfnRemove)
methods.description: Registers a new feature object with a specified name and OID, along with creation and removal routines.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscOcoRegisterObject2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * objectName,ULONG oid,char * baseObjectName,ULONG baseOid,char * derivedType,ULONG brokerOid,void * pfnCreate,void * pfnRemove)
methods.description: Registers a new feature object with extended parameters including base object details, derived type, and broker OID, along with creation and removal routines.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscOcoCreateObjectByName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,char * objectName)
methods.description: Creates a container object based on the specified object name.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscOcoCreateObjectByOid(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ULONG oid)
methods.description: Creates a container object based on the specified object OID.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscOcoCreateObjectByType(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,char * baseObjectName,char * derivedType)
methods.description: Creates a container object based on a base object name and derived type.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscOcoGetObjectByRid(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG rid)
methods.description: Retrieves an object handle mapped to a runtime object ID.

ctags.name: AnscOcoRegisterObject2
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * objectName,ULONG oid,char * baseObjectName,ULONG baseOid,char * derivedType,ULONG brokerOid,void * pfnCreate,void * pfnRemove)
